response:
<<<api>>>: sb.delete(sb.length() - 1, sb.length());
<<<code>>>: for (String serverId : serverIds) {  sb.append(serverId);   sb.append(",");}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the delete method to remove the last character from the StringBuilder.
